Export.zv: IRIS for UNIX (Ubuntu Server LTS for x86-64 Containers) 2019.3 (Build 308U)

XData.name: BPL
XData.Data: <process language='objectscript' request='RRLACESrv.BO.UpdateEncounterRequest' response='Ens.Response' height='2150' width='2000' > <context> <property name='UpdateEncounterResult' type='%Library.Status' initialexpression='1' instantiate='0' /> <property name='EmailTo' type='%String' instantiate='0' > <parameters> <parameter name='MAXLEN' value='50' /> </parameters> </property> <property name='EmailSubject' type='%String' instantiate='0' > <parameters> <parameter name='MAXLEN' value='50' /> </parameters> </property> <property name='EmailText' type='%String' instantiate='0' > <parameters> <parameter name='MAXLEN' value='' /> </parameters> </property> <property name='RiskScore' type='%Integer' instantiate='0' /> <property name='LScore' type='%Integer' instantiate='0' /> <property name='AScore' type='%Integer' instantiate='0' /> <property name='CScore' type='%Integer' instantiate='0' /> <property name='EScore' type='%Integer' instantiate='0' /> <property name='PatientID' type='%String' instantiate='0' > <parameters> <parameter name='MAXLEN' value='50' /> </parameters> </property> <property name='DischargeLocation' type='%String' instantiate='0' > <parameters> <parameter name='MAXLEN' value='50' /> </parameters> </property> <property name='AlertMessage' type='%String' instantiate='0' > <parameters> <parameter name='MAXLEN' value='2500' /> </parameters> </property> <property name='EncounterID' type='%String' instantiate='0' > <parameters> <parameter name='MAXLEN' value='50' /> </parameters> </property> <property name='MLReadmissionRisk' type='%Float' instantiate='0' /> <property name='LACEScoreAggregate' type='%String' instantiate='0' > <parameters> <parameter name='MAXLEN' value='' /> </parameters> </property> </context> <sequence xend='200' yend='1900' > <call name='Update Encounter' target='LACE SOAP Operation' async='0' xpos='200' ypos='250' > <annotation><![CDATA[An update has occurred on the EMR system. This update needs to be propagated to the Risk Engines's normalized Datalake. ]]></annotation> <request type='RRLACESrv.BO.UpdateEncounterRequest' > <assign property="callrequest" value="request" action="set" /> </request> <response type='RRLACESrv.BO.UpdateEncounterResponse' > <assign property="context.UpdateEncounterResult" value="callresponse.UpdateEncounterResult" action="set" /> <assign property="context.EncounterID" value="callresponse.EncounterID" action="set" /> </response> </call> <call name='Calculate Risk with LACE' target='LACE SOAP Operation' async='0' xpos='200' ypos='350' > <request type='RRLACESrv.BO.RiskRequest' > <assign property="callrequest.PatientID" value="request.PatientID" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.EncounterNumber" value="request.EncounterNumber" action="set" /> </request> <response type='RRLACESrv.BO.RiskResponse' > <assign property="response" value="callresponse" action="set" /> <assign property="context.RiskScore" value="$Piece(callresponse.RiskResult,",",1)" action="set" /> <assign property="context.LScore" value="$Piece(callresponse.RiskResult,",",5)" action="set" /> <assign property="context.AScore" value="$Piece(callresponse.RiskResult,",",2)" action="set" /> <assign property="context.CScore" value="$Piece(callresponse.RiskResult,",",3)" action="set" /> <assign property="context.EScore" value="$Piece(callresponse.RiskResult,",",4)" action="set" /> <assign property="context.LACEScoreAggregate" value="callresponse.RiskResult" action="set" /> </response> </call> <call name='Calculate Risk with ML' target='change-this' async='0' xpos='200' ypos='450' > <request type='ML.Model.BO.Executor.CubeSourceScoreRequest' > <assign property="callrequest.MLOperationName" value=""Readmission Model Executor"" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.CubeSourceRowID" value="context.EncounterID" action="set" /> </request> <response type='ML.Model.BO.Executor.ScoreResponse' > <assign property="context.MLReadmissionRisk" value="callresponse.ModelOutput.GetAt("probability1")" action="set" /> </response> </call> <call name='EMR Readmission Update' target='HisDB Encounter Update Operation' async='1' xpos='200' ypos='550' > <annotation><![CDATA[After every update to an Encounter that triggers a probability update in the Risk Engine, the EMR system needs to be synced to show real time running probabilities.]]></annotation> <request type='IRISDemo.BO.EncounterUpdate.EncounterUpdateRequest' > <assign property="callrequest.MLPrediction" value="context.MLReadmissionRisk" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.EncounterID" value="request.EncounterNumber" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.LACEScore" value="context.LACEScoreAggregate" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.LACEScoreAggregate" value="context.RiskScore" action="set" /> </request> </call> <if name='Discharge OK?' condition='(request.UpdateMessageType = "A03") && (context.UpdateEncounterResult=1)' xpos='200' ypos='650' xend='200' yend='1800' > <annotation><![CDATA[If the Update Request has completed successfully and the update is a Discharge Request then the risk engine needs to check and see if an alert should be triggered.]]></annotation> <true> <if name='Risk Alert?' condition='(context.RiskScore>11) || (context.MLReadmissionRisk > 0.15)' xpos='335' ypos='800' xend='335' yend='1700' > <annotation><![CDATA[If LACE score is above 10 or if ML readmission prediction is above 15%]]></annotation> <true> <assign name="Compose Alert Message" property="context.AlertMessage" value=""Patient '"_request.PatientID_"' has just been discharged to '"_request.DischargeLocation_"' and has a "_$select(context.RiskScore>9:"high",1:"moderate")_" risk of readmission"_$char(13,10)_"The scores are as follows:"_$char(13,10)_"Risk Score: "_context.RiskScore_$char(13,10)_"'L' Score (Length of stay): "_context.LScore_$char(13,10)_"'A' Score (Acuity): "_context.AScore_$char(13,10)_"'C' Score (Comorbidity): "_context.CScore_$char(13,10)_"'E' Score (Emergency department visits): "_context.EScore_$char(13,10)_"ML Readmission Risk Prediction: "_(context.MLReadmissionRisk*100)_"%"" action="set" xpos='470' ypos='950' /> <call name='Add Patient to Risk Program' target='Care Team' async='1' xpos='470' ypos='1050' > <request type='EnsLib.Workflow.TaskRequest' > <assign property="callrequest.%Message" value="context.AlertMessage" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.%Subject" value=""Patient at Risk of Readmission"" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.%Actions" value=""Visited the Patient,Called the Patient"" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.%FormFields" value=""PatientID,DischargeLocation,RiskScore"" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.%FormValues" value="request.PatientID_","_request.DischargeLocation_","_context.RiskScore" action="set" /> </request> <response type='EnsLib.Workflow.TaskResponse' /> </call> <call name='Alert Care Team' target='Risk Alert Email Operation' async='0' xpos='470' ypos='1150' > <request type='IRISDemo.BO.Email.EmailMessage' > <assign property="callrequest.From" value=""IRISDemo"" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.Subject" value=""LACE readmission alert"" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.To" value=""readmission.alert@healthcare.med"" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.MessageText" value="context.AlertMessage" action="set" /> </request> </call> <sync name='Follow up SLA 2 days' calls='Add Patient to Risk Program' timeout='172800' type='all' xpos='470' ypos='1250' > <annotation><![CDATA[Is the patient following the care plan?]]></annotation> </sync> <if name='No follow up?' condition='synctimedout' xpos='470' ypos='1350' xend='470' yend='1600' > <true> <alert value='"Follow up of patient id "_request.PatientID_" pending."' xpos='605' ypos='1500' /> </true> </if> </true> </if> </true> </if> </sequence> </process>
